price: Sie sagten: „Hast du dies mit unseren Göttern getan, o Ibrahim?
arabic: قَالُوٓاْ ءَأَنتَ فَعَلۡتَ هَٰذَا بِـَٔالِهَتِنَا يَٰٓإِبۡرَٰهِيمُ

version.title: German Translation - Bubenheim
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into German by Abdullah As-Samit (Frank Bubenheim) and Dr. Nadeem Elyas

meta.transliteration: qālū a-anta faʿalta hādhā biālihatinā yāib'rāhīmu
